Uses of Package
edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util

  • Packages that use edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util
    Provides classes that are generally useful to the various frontend classes.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio
    Provides an tool that records and displays the waveform and spectrogram of an audio signal.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.live
    Provides an tool that performs pseudo-live-mode speech recognition.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util used by edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util 
    Class and Description
    AudioFileDataSource
    An AudioFileDataSource generates a stream of audio data from a given audio file.
    AudioFileProcessListener
    An interface which is describes the functionality which is required to handle new file signals fired by the audio-data sources.
    StreamDataSource
    A StreamDataSource converts data from an InputStream into Data objects.
    Utterance
    Represents the complete audio data of an utterance.
    VUMeter
    Copyright 1999-2006 Carnegie Mellon University.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util used by edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio 
    Class and Description
    StreamDataSource
    A StreamDataSource converts data from an InputStream into Data objects.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util used by edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.live 
    Class and Description
    ConcatFileDataSource
    Concatenates a list raw headerless audio files as one continuous audio stream.
